item.title: Calculating the posterior probability distribution of parameters with emcee python module
item.description: The emcee() python module emcee can be used to obtain the posterior probability distribution of parameters, given a set of experimental data. An example problem is a double exponential decay. A small amount of Gaussian noise is also added.%matplotlib inline import numpy as np import lmfit from matplotlib import pyplot as plt import corner import emcee from pylab import * ion() x = np.linspace(1, 10, 250) np.random.seed(0) y = 3.
